title: LOL DC for no reason
body: Ive been experiencing this problem only for the current game,  my internet connection is working super great but out of nowhere my game starting DC'ing alone and this especially happens just as i spawn, And as soon I move I see my champion going anywhere I click without stopping, and soon as I die I reconnect, why is this happening?

replies.body:
When you mentioned...

> as soon I move I see my champion going anywhere I click without stopping

It really sounds like you might be having some packet loss issues. Essentially that means that parts of the data your network is sending to us is getting lost or damaged along the way. Let's run a quick test for it by letting this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan the network logs from that game you mentioned. Grab a screenshot and post it here so I can look over it with you!
